## Installation

You can install the released version of boligfinn from [CRAN](https://CRAN.R-project.org) when I'm ready to publish it in CRAN with:

``` {r eval=FALSE}
install.packages("boligfinn")
```
but until that time comes, then you have to install it from **GitHub**.

```{r eval=FALSE}
if(!require(remotes)) install.packages("remotes")
remotes::install_github("ybkamaleri/boligfinn")
```

## Example

This is a basic example which shows you how to solve a common problem:

```{r example, eval=FALSE}
library(boligfinn)
## basic example code
DF <- finn()
```
